description_for_human: 20 Use Case AI pronti all'uso per PMI e enterprise italiane.
description_for_model: elevIA provides 20 ready-to-use AI solutions for Italian businesses, organized in 5 areas: Knowledge, Customer Experience, Operations, Workflow, HR. Each use case is delivered in 15 days with 85%+ accuracy and 99% availability. Solutions include RAG Knowledge Base, Chatbot FAQ, Report Automatici, Lead Scoring, Screening CV, and more.
